other_title: 博人传 火影忍者新时代 (Chinese (PRC))
plot: Years have passed since Naruto and Sasuke teamed up to defeat Kaguya, the progenitor of chakra and the greatest threat the ninja world has ever faced. Times are now peaceful and the new generation of shinobi has not experienced the same hardships as its parents. Perhaps that is why Boruto would rather play video games than train. However, one passion does burn deep in this ninja boy’s heart, and that is the desire to defeat his father, Naruto. (from manga)
opening_theme: "It's all in the game" by Qyoto
ending_theme: "Denshin Tamashii" by Game Jikkyousha Wakuwaku Band
"Leica" by Bird Bear Hare and Fish
insert_song: "Kaze ni Nare" (風になれ) by Ray (ep 15)
